By use of a yeast interaction screen to search for CDK6 - interacting proteins, we have also identified an 18 - kD human protein, p18, that is a homolog of the cyclin D - CDK4 inhibitors p16 ( INK4A / MTS1) and p14 ( MTS2 / INK4B).
Distinct from the p21 / p27 family of CDK inhibitors that form ternary complexes with cyclin - CDKs, only binary complexes of p14, p16, and p18 were found in association with CDK4 and / or CDK6.
